member.name: WS_BYTES_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Specifies constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized. This type description is used with and is optional.

member.name: WS_BYTES_DESCRIPTION.minByteCount
member.summary: Specifies the minimum number of bytes.

member.name: WS_BYTES_DESCRIPTION.maxByteCount
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of bytes.
